column5: Has anyone been to these Ice bungalows? What's your opinion? Great price at 140 midweek for 3 nights, 4 days. Hope someone can help as I've always stayed with idle Tyme or bear creek.
Stayed there a couple autumns ago.  Very nice owners, but not sure what their winter operation is like.  Their resort is about 15-20 mins up the S. River btw.
I would probably want to find out where his huts are located first before booking.If they are near the resort up the river fishing might not be so good.You would prefer out in south bay.
